snippet: The couple are married at Trinity Church in New York
lead_paragraph: Laura Elsa Bartels and Joseph Walter Zalewski were married Saturday in New York. The Rev. Mark F. Bozzuti-Jones, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at Trinity Church. Mrs. Zalewski, 35, is the assistant director of the academic marketing division at the Columbia Business School. She is also studying for a master's in education at Columbia's Teachers College. She graduated from Princeton and received an M.B.A. from New York University.
